Title: Relates to the registration and regulation of animal breeders
Summary: Relates to the registration and regulation of animal breeders; requires each to be licensed; creates a breeder licensing fund; exempts not-for-profit organizations.
LawCode: Add Art 26-C §§420 - 428, amd §§401 & 402, Ag & Mkts L; add §98-d, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the state finance law, in relation to the registration and regulation of animal breeders
